Summary: I was in the first grade my teacher pointed it out.
Object Shape: Cigar, Circle, Cylinder, Disc, Oval, Sphere, Teardrop
divs: Sighting Detailsi was at recess when my teacher said look up theres a ufo, i remember just like it was yesterday there was a bright oblong to circle object in the sky, it was super bright i know this because it was a sunny day this object moved through the sky like nothing i ever seen even now i have never seen anything that even closely resembles what we sall that day. the object was on one side of the sky then the other and then back, lightning speed in order for it to move that far that quick it had to be out of this world. and then it was gone.........been telling this story for years and i still say it was a ufo....i would like to get a hold of my 1st grade teacher to see if he remembers anything about that day...i know i never forgot!i could take you to the exact spot we were standing that day.still gives me chills
